price: نو چا چې ظلمونه كړي يقيناً د عذاب برخه يې د خپلو ملګرو د برخې په شان ده نو په ېیړه دې دعذاب غوښتنه را څخه نه كوي.
arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū dhanūban mith'la dhanūbi aṣḥābihim falā yastaʿjilūni
translations: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten
